Articles.Content:
Were do I start.

Download source:Steam

1. In career mode I cant open any buildings other than the VAB and when I get in there is no kit.

2. Sound defaults to off.

3. Cannot reasign any keys.

- - - Updated - - -

Write I think I found the issue, corrupted upgrade download. I deleted the game and its associated local files and reinstaled the game from Steam. Seems to work, therefore my assumption is a corrupted update instal.

Edited April 27, 2015 by Sochin
Please verify your Steam game cache and try again, if it persists please see the support stickies
